full_description:
ORICO HPC-4A5U-V1-EU 4 AC Outlet Surge Protector with 5 USB Charging Port Smart Power Strip

The ORICO HPC-4A5U-V1-EU Smart Power Strip features 4 AC Outlet Surge Protector with 5 USB Charging Port. It has a rated power of 4000W (250V, 16A) and a USB Output of 5V8A 40W. It is made of ABS + PC Fire-retardant 94V0 material and it has a 1.5M long cable. It has a White LED power indicator. The ORICO HPC-4A5U-V1-EU supports Surge Protection & Overload Protection. This smart Power Strip comes with a 1-year warranty.
